channel.title: Barriers to Npcs and No following after death
channel.description: Okay this has been a problem chasing me throughout the entire time I tinker with these. I can't figure out how to set objects to be unwalkable to Npcs, and if they kill me or anyone else kills me, they will go from their location to whereever I respawn. I'm out of ideas atm, does anyone have any ideas. If there was a tutorial on this I didn't find it.

item.title: Barriers to Npcs and No following after death
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Okay this has been a problem chasing me throughout the entire time I tinker with these. I can’t figure out how to set objects to be unwalkable to Npcs, and if they kill me or anyone else kills me, they will go from their location to whereever I respawn. I’m out of ideas atm, does anyone have any ideas. If there was a tutorial on this I didn’t find it.
